-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Bracketed HaskellDB HDBC session using lifted-base
--   
--   This package includes bracketed HDBC session function using
--   lifted-base for HaskellDB.
@package haskelldb-connect-hdbc-lifted
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Bracketed HaskellDB session with <a>MonadBaseControl</a> <a>IO</a>.
module Database.HaskellDB.Connect.HDBC.Lifted

-- | Run an action on a HDBC IConnection and close the connection.
--   <a>MonadBaseControl</a> <a>IO</a> version.
hdbcSession :: (MonadBaseControl IO m, IConnection conn) => SqlGenerator -> IO conn -> (conn -> Database -> m a) -> m a
